0011100010100110 1001100001010100 1 -> sum: 1101000011111011, cout: 0

1000011110010000 0110011011110010 0 -> sum: 1110111010000010, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
